Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/major delays and congestion following an earlier stalled train at California. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/major delays and congestion following an earlier stalled train at California. 

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.  Bus shuttle service is available between LaSalle and Belmont.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
